level.heading: Information reporting.
level.text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: Section 110 of D.C. Law 18-156 added a section to read as follows:
"Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council."
Section 402(b) of D.C. Law 18-156 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 110 of Energy Efficiency Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-324, March 1, 2010, 57 DCR 1851).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-183, see notes following ยง 8-1778.01.
